item.description:
You can listen online to the interview by Robert Barron of Jonathan Mark covering a range of subjects. Truthquake radio starts at 8pm East Coast USA time, Jonathan will join the show in about ten minutes in. You can listen to the program live on the Internet at www.ValleyFreeRadio.org - It will also be available on Podcast later.

Truthquake is broken into 3 segments - 1. Discussing the 9/11 attacks and pointing out inconsistencies in the official story of 9/11, and showcasing news reports and scientific evidence that the public may not be aware of. 2. News and information on the often overlooked problems in our air, water, and food. Examples of this include- the chemical aerosol spraying program, the effects of sodium fluoride in public water, food issues such as effects of high fructose corn syrup and aspartame, the dangers of vaccines, and the implementation of codex alimentarius. 3. An alternative viewpoint commentary on mainstream media news and current events.

The program with Jonathan Mark will be on the Flyby News' perspective for life's survival in the 21st Century since 1999.. and its plans to reassess most everything this coming December 21st. The topic of unidentified flying objects will be included in this program.. Hold on.. and let's try to connect many dots for where we are.. and where we hope to get to .. truth, justice and what has not become the American Way.

 

I recommend watching some videos for background information. Rob mentioned that he plans to ask about the Phoenix Lights and the Disclosure Project Testimonies, as well as other issues. This is last year to complete my 13 year commitment in reporting news for life's survival in this Century. I gained a unique perspective by being part of a campaign that exposed the high risk Cassini (plutonium) 1999 flyby of Earth. I will try to answer why I am half optimistic for an amazing turnaround, and why plan to reassess this on December 21, 2012.

 

Credible Witness - UFO / ET Disclosure Documentation

 

December, 2011 - Disclose.TV - History Channel
SECRET ACCESS: UFOs On The Record

MASS SIGHTINGS WORLDWIDE

of advanced pre-ice-age civilizations.

item.name: Robert Barron Interviews Jonathan Mark on Truthquake Radio
